mapper.select: SELECT question_id as questionId, question_name as questionName, question_creator_id as questionCreatorId, question_level_id as questionLevelId, question_type_id as questionTypeId, question_score as questionScore, question_category as questionCategoryid, question_description as questionDescription, question_option_ids as questionOptionIds, question_answer_option_ids as questionAnswerOptionIds, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, question_category_name as questionCategoryName FROM question a,question_category b where a.question_category=b.question_category_id
